About

Welcome to Just Ask Me IT, your source for Computer Maintenance and Hardware Support. I am dedicated to providing you with quality service, and an emphasis on Known Hardware Brands, Customised Desktop Computers, Home Internet Troubleshooting and Computer Tune-ups.

Founded in 2008 by Andrew Button, Just Ask Me IT began when Andrew decided to take 'his passion' for the I.T. Industry and turn this passion for Computer Building and Maintenance into his own business.

I hope you enjoy the quality of service provided, as much as I enjoy offering it to you. If you have any questions or comments, please don't hesitate to contact me.


Sincerely,

Andrew Button

Services

A selection of Services that are offered. Other Services may be undertaken and arranged by Appointment

General / Maintenance

Undertaking Basic Computer Support, Backup of Data, Software Training, Home Internet Connectivity & Troubleshooting, Basic Hardware/Parts Upgrades

$35.00 (per hour)

PC Refresh / Laptops

Reinstallation of Operating System Software (refresh only), Setup and Configuration, Installation of Basic Maintenance Tools, Full Stress Testing

$150.00 (fixed)

Custom Desktop Computers

New Computer Build and Installation of Software, Setup and Configuration, Installation of Basic Maintenance Tools, Full Stress Testing

$250.00 (minimum amount)
